com.vijfhart.casus.tree

Interface Tree<T extends Node<T>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>, TreeIterable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeTree

    public interface Tree<T extends Node<T>>
extends TreeIterable<T>
    A Tree-structured collection containing Node elements. The main characteristic of a Tree is that is an IterableTree: it can iterate through its elements using a TreeIterator. Elements can be added to a Tree using the add method. Furthermore, statistics can be calculated of characaristics of nodes beneath a given node using lambda expressions.
